card.name: Arrest
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can’t attack or block, and its activated abilities can’t be activated.

card.name: Bantha Herd
card.text: X2W: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Bantha Herd becomes monstrous, create X 1/1 white Tusken creature tokens named Tusken Raider.

card.name: The Battle of Hoth
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When The Battle of Hoth enters, create two 1/1 white Trooper creature tokens. --- (Back): Echo Base

card.name: Echo Base
card.text: Echo Base enters tapped. 2W, {T}: Create a token copy of target creature token you control that didn’t enter this turn. --- (Front): The Battle of Hoth

card.name: Battle Tactics
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+1 and gain lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Cantina Band
card.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target nonartifact creature.

card.name: Condemn
card.text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner’s library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Deploy The Troops
card.text: Create three 1/1 white Trooper creature tokens.

card.name: Droideka
card.text: 2U: Put a shield counter on Droideka if it doesn’t have one. Activate only once each turn and only if no counters were removed from Droideka this turn. (If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.) Repair 3 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Escape Pod
card.text: Exile target creature you control. Return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Force Healing
card.text: Choose a color. You and up to one target creature you control gain hexproof from that color until end of turn. Scry 1.

card.name: Force Reflex
card.text: Untap target creature. It gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Gifted Initiate
card.text: When Gifted Initiate enters, you may tap up to one target creature. If you do, tap Gifted Initiate. Meditate 2W (2W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ion Cannon
card.text: Defender {T}: Target attacking creature an opponent controls loses spaceflight until end of turn.

card.name: Jedi Battle Healer
card.text: Lifelink When Jedi Battle Healer enters, you gain 2 life. Meditate 1W (1W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Instructor
card.text: When Jedi Instructor enters, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one other target creature. Meditate 1W (1W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Starfighter
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Whenever a creature that crewed Jedi Starfighter this turn leaves the battlefield, Jedi Starfighter gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Meditate 1W (1W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.) Crew 1

card.name: LAAT Gunship
card.text: Whenever LAAT Gunship attacks, you may pay {W}. If you do, LAAT Gunship gains spaceflight until end of turn. Otherwise, create a 1/1 white Trooper creature token. (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Crew 1

card.name: Lando Calrissian
card.text: Lando Calrissian has first strike as long as he’s attacking. At the beginning of combat on your turn, target Vehicle creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Loyal Tauntaun
card.text: 1G, Sacrifice Loyal Tauntaun: Target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Maintenance Hangar
card.text: If one or more time counters would be removed from a card you own in exile, remove that many plus one instead. Vehicles you control have repair 6. When a Vehicle card is exiled this way, it gains repair for as long as it remains exiled.

card.name: Miraculous Recovery
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Nebulon-B Frigate
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) When Nebulon-B Frigate enters, creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn. Crew 1

card.name: Orbital Bombardment
card.text: Destroy all creatures and Vehicles without spaceflight.

card.name: Plo Koon
card.text: You may activate meditate abilities any time you could cast an instant. Meditate 1W (1W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Riding Ronto
card.text: 3WW: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as Riding Ronto is monstrous, it has vigilance.

card.name: Sand Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control have vigilance.

card.name: Security Droid
card.text: When Security Droid enters, create a 1/1 colorless Droid artifact creature token. Repair 3 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Snow Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control have first strike.

card.name: Womp Rat
card.text: 4W: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put one +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Womp Rat becomes monstrous, you may exile target card from a graveyard.

card.name: X-Wing
card.text: Vigilance Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or greater: This Rebel Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Admiral Ackbar
card.text: When you cast Admiral Ackbar, create two B-Wings, they’re kindred 2/3 blue Rebel Vehicle artifact tokens with spaceflight and crew 1. At the beginning of each upkeep, untap all Vehicles you control. Whenever two or more Vehicles you control attack, draw a card.

card.name: Armed Protocol Droid
card.text: Flash When Armed Protocol Droid enters, target nonartifact creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn. Repair 3 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: The Battle of Naboo
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When The Battle of Naboo enters, return up to X target creatures to their owners’ hands. Draw twice that many cards. --- (Back): Gungan Shield Array

card.name: Gungan Shield Array
card.text: Creatures you control have ward {2}. (Whenever this permanent becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.) Creatures can’t attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that’s attacking you. --- (Front): The Battle of Naboo

card.name: Cloaking Device
card.text: Enchant creature or Vehicle Enchanted creature can’t be blocked. Whenever enchanted creature attacks, defending player loses 1 life.

card.name: Force Denial
card.text: Hate — Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. If an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, counter that spell instead. Scry 1.

card.name: Force Push
card.text: Put target artifact or creature on top of its owner’s library. Scry 1.

card.name: Gungan Captain
card.text: Whenever Gungan Captain deals damage to a creature, tap that creature. That creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

card.name: Jar Jar Binks
card.text: Jar Jar Binks can’t block. When Jar Jar Binks enters, target opponent gains control of it. At the beginning of combat on your turn, tap the creature you control with the highest power. If two or more creatures are tied for the greatest power, you choose one of them.

card.name: Jedi Battle Mage
card.text: When Jedi Battle Mage enters, put a stun counter on up to one target creature an opponent controls. Tap that creature. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.) Meditate 1U (1U: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Mind Trick
card.text: You control target player during their next turn.

card.name: Jedi Training
card.text: Meditate abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate. Whenever a Jedi creature you control meditates, scry 1.

card.name: Jump Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control have ward {2}. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

card.name: Mace Windu
card.text: Flash When Mace Windu enters, return target spell or creature you don’t control to its owner’s hand. Meditate 1U (1U: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Mon Calamari Cruiser
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Whenever Mon Calamari Cruiser deals combat damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent protects, you may draw a card. (Players protect permanents that can be attacked.) Crew 2

card.name: Mon Calamari Initiate
card.text: Flash When Mon Calamari Initiate enters, draw a card. Meditate 1U (1U: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ortolan Keyboardist
card.text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Personal Energy Shield
card.text: Counter target spell that targets you or a permanent you control.

card.name: Preordain
card.text: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Probe Droid
card.text: When Probe Droid enters, target player reveals their hand. Repair 4 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with four time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Republic Frigate
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Whenever a Trooper enters under your control, untap Republic Frigate. Crew 1

card.name: Rumination
card.text: Draw three cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your library.

card.name: Shadow Trooper
card.text: Flash You may cast Trooper creature cards as though they had flash.

card.name: Sith Manipulator
card.text: Hate — When Sith Manipulator enters, return target artifact or creature to its owner’s hand. If an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, instead that creature’s controller puts it on the top or bottom of their library instead.

card.name: Sith Sorcerer
card.text: When Sith Sorcerer enters, scry 2. Hate — When Sith Sorcerer dies, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Super Battle Droid
card.text: Repair 2 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with two time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Surprise Maneuver
card.text: Untap up to two target nonland permanents you control. You may have one of those permanents that’s a Vehicle, becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Spider Droid
card.text: Repair 6 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with six time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.) Whenever one or more nontoken creatures you control leave the battlefield, if Spider Droid is in exile, you may remove a time counter from it.

card.name: Vapor Snag
card.text: Return target creature to its owner’s hand. Its controller loses 1 life.

card.name: Y-Wing
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Y-Wing can’t block. Whenever Y-Wing deals combat damage to an opponent or a permanent they protect, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a stun counter on target creature defending player controls. Tap that creature. (Players protect permanents that can be attacked.) Crew 1

card.name: Zam Wesell
card.text: When you cast Zam Wesell, target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a creature card from it and have Zam Wesell enter as a copy of that creature card.

card.name: Acquire Target
card.text: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life. Put a bounty counter on up to one target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Aqualish Bounty Hunter
card.text: When Aqualish Bounty Hunter enters, put a bounty counter on target permanent Whenever you complete a bounty, target player discards a card. (You complete a bounty when a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter is put into their graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: The Battle of Yavin
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When The Battle of Yavin enters, for each nonland permanent you don’t control, its controller sacrifices it unless they pay X life. --- (Back): Trench Run

card.name: Trench Run
card.text: Each opponent sacrifices a legendary permanent. Each opponent that can’t sacrifices a creature instead. --- (Front): The Battle of Yavin

card.name: Bib Fortuna
card.text: When Bib Fortuna enters, search your library for a card, then shuffle, then put that card on top of it. You lose 1 life. When Bib Fortuna dies, shuffle your library.

card.name: Black Market Dealer
card.text: Whenever an outlaw creature you control dies, put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls. (Assassins, Mercenaries, Pirates, Rogues, and Warlocks are outlaws.) Whenever you complete a bounty, target player loses 1 life and draws a card. (You complete a bounty when a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter is put into their graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: Bounty Spotter
card.text: Bounty Spotter doesn’t untap during your untap step. {T}: Put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls. Whenever you complete a bounty counter dies, untap Bounty Spotter. (You complete a bounty when a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter is put into their graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: Death Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control have deathtouch.

card.name: Doom Blade
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Droid Commando
card.text: When Droid Commando dies, target player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. Repair 3 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Force Drain
card.text: Force Drain deals 2 damage to any target. Hate — Then if an opponent lose life from a source other than combat damage this turn, you gain 2 life. Scry 1.

card.name: Grand Moff Tarkin
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, destroy target creature that player controls unless they pay 2 life and discard a card.

card.name: Hazard Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control have intimidate. (This creature can’t be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

card.name: Head Hunting
card.text: Put a bounty counter on up to one target creature an opponent controls. Each opponent loses 1 life. Draw a card.

card.name: Heavy Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control get +0/+1.

card.name: IG-88B
card.text: Deathtouch Whenever IG-88B deals combat damage to an opponent or a permanent they protect, that player loses life equal to the number of bounty counters among permanents they control. (Players protect permanents that can be attacked.) Repair 3

card.name: Insatiable Rakghoul
card.text: Insatiable Rakghoul enters with a +1/+1 counter if a nonartifact creature died this turn.

card.name: Interrogation
card.text: Target player discards a card. Then that player discards another card unless they pay 3 life.

card.name: Neophyte Hateflayer
card.text: {T}, Pay 1 life: Each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Open Season
card.text: When Open Season enters, put a bounty counter up to one target creature. Activated abilities of creatures your opponents control with a bounty counter can’t be activated. Creatures with a bounty counter can’t crew Vehicles. Whenever you complete a bounty, that creature’s controller loses 2 life. Each other player gains 2 life. (You complete a bounty when a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter is put into their graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: Order 66
card.text: Order 66 costs {1} less to cast for each creature your opponents control with a bounty counter. Put a bounty counter on each creature you don’t control, then destroy all creatures you don’t control.

card.name: Repurpose
card.text: Destroy target creature or Vehicle. Return up to one target creature or Vehicle card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Rule of Two
card.text: As long as you control exactly two creatures, those creatures get +2/+0 and have deathtouch and lifelink.

card.name: Sith Assassin
card.text: Hate — When Sith Assassin enters, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, destroy up to one target nonblack creature.

card.name: Sith Evoker
card.text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature’s power or toughness.

card.name: Sith Inquisitor
card.text: Hate — When Sith Inquisitor enters, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, each opponent discards a card at random.

card.name: Sith Lord
card.text: Menace Sith Lord enters with X +1/+1 counters, where X is the total amount of life lost by your opponents this turn.

card.name: Sith Thoughtseeker
card.text: Hate — 2U: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn.

card.name: Swarm the Skies
card.text: Create two TIE Fighters, they’re 2/1 black Vehicle artifact tokens with spaceflight and crew 1.

card.name: TIE Bomber
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Whenever TIE Bomber deals combat damage to a player or a permanent they protect, you may sacrifice TIE Bomber. If you do, target creature that player controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn. (Players protect permanents that can be attacked.) Crew 1

card.name: TIE Interceptor
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Whenever TIE Interceptor attacks, each opponent loses 2 life. Crew 1

card.name: Unruly Sureshot
card.text: When Unruly Sureshot enters, put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls. 3R: Unruly Sureshot deals 2 damage to target creature with a bounty counter.

card.name: A-Wing
card.text: Haste Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) A-Wing attacks each combat if able. {1}: Remove A-Wing from combat. When it’s removed from combat this way, at the beginning of your next combat, it becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. Crew 1

card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) card.name: Bounty Sniper
card.text: {T}: Bounty Sniper deals 1 damage to any target. Whenever you complete a bounty, untap Bounty Sniper. (You complete a bounty when a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter is put into their graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: Capture
card.text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. If it has a bounty counter, add RRR.

card.name: Crossfire
card.text: Crossfire deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature’s controller.

card.name: Dark Apprenticeship
card.text: Hate — At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, Dark Apprenticeship deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Force Lightning
card.text: Choose two— • Force Lightning deals X damage to target player. • Force Lightning deals twice X damage to any nonplayer target. • Scry 1 up to X times.

card.name: Force Scream
card.text: Force Scream deals 2 damage to each creature without spaceflight and each player. Scry 1.

card.name: Force Spark
card.text: Force Spark deals 1 damage to any target. Scry 1.

card.name: Gamorrean Prison Guard
card.text: Whenever a creature enters under an opponent’s control, if Gamorrean Prison Guard is untapped, it fights that creature.

card.name: Gundark
card.text: Haste 3RR: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Gundark becomes monstrous, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Han Solo
card.text: Han Solo has first strike as long as he’s attacking. At the beginning of combat on your turn, target Vehicle creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Imperial Gunner
card.text: {1}, {T}: Imperial Gunner deals 1 damage to target player, planeswalker, or Vehicle creature.

card.name: Jango Fett
card.text: Menace, haste Whenever Jango Fett attacks a player, put a bounty counter on up to one target creature they control. Whenever Jango Fett attacks, it gets +X/+0, where X is the number of creatures defending player controls with a bounty counter.

card.name: Lightning Bolt
card.text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Novice Bounty Hunter
card.text: Whenever you complete a bounty, Novice Bounty Hunter deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker. (You complete a bounty when a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter is put into their graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: Raging Reek
card.text: Raging Reek attacks each turn if able. 5R: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: Rallying Fire
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. {R}, Exile Rallying Fire from your graveyard: Rallying Fire deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Revenge
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls. The creature you control gets +4/+0 until end of turn before it fights if you lost life this turn.

card.name: Rocket Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control have “When this creature enters, it deals 1 damage to any target.”

card.name: Shock Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control get +2/+0.

card.name: Sith Marauder
card.text: Hate — When Sith Marauder enters, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, Sith Marauder deals 3 damage to any target.

card.name: Sith Ravager
card.text: Hate — As long as an opponent has lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, Sith Ravager gets +1/+0 and gains haste and trample until end of turn.

card.name: Smash to Smithereens
card.text: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact’s controller.

card.name: Speeder Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control have haste.

card.name: Syndicate Enforcer
card.text: When Syndicate Enforcer enters, put a bounty counter on up to one target creature an opponent controls. Whenever a bounty counter is placed on a creature an opponent controls, that creature can’t block this turn.

card.name: Terentatek Cub
card.text: As long as an opponent controls a Jedi or Sith, Terentatek Cub gets +1/+1 and attacks each turn if able.

card.name: V-Wing
card.text: Haste Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or greater: This Rebel Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) They gain trample and haste until end of turn. --- (Back): Planetary Shield-Generator

card.text: Lands you control have indestructible. You may play an additional land on each of your turns. --- (Front): The Battle of Endor

card.text: Deathtouch Whenever a land enters under your control, put a bounty counter on up to one target creature. Whenever you complete a bounty, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Ki-Adi-Mundi
card.text: When Ki-Adi-Mundi enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control. Meditate 1G (1G: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Legacy of the Beloved
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Legacy of the Beloved, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for up to two creature cards that each have a lower mana value than the creature sacrificed to cast Legacy of the Beloved. Put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Mantellian Savrip
card.text: 5GG: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) Creatures with power less than Mantellian Savrip’s power can’t block it.

card.name: Regression
card.text: The owner of target artifact or enchantment shuffles it into their library.

card.name: Scout the Perimeter
card.text: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Put a bounty counter on up to one target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Scout Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Shaak Herd
card.text: When Shaak Herd dies, you may return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Show of Dominance
card.text: Put four +1/+1 counters on the creature with the highest power. If two or more creatures are tied for the greatest power, you choose one of them. That creature gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Trooper Commando
card.text: Trooper creatures you control have trample.

card.name: Wookiee Bounty Hunter
card.text: Whenever you complete a bounty, you gain 3 life. (You complete a bounty when a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter is put into their graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: AAT-1
card.text: Whenever one or more repair counters are removed from a card you own in exile, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Repair 4 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with four time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.) Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or greater: This Droid Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: Acklay of the Arena
card.text: 2RGW: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) Whenever a creature you control becomes monstrous, it fights target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Adroit Hateflayer
card.text: Menace (This creature can’t be blocked except by two or more creatures.) Whenever Adroit Hateflayer attacks, each player loses 2 life.

card.name: Anakin Skywalker
card.text: Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Anakin Skywalker. Sacrifice another creature: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery. If Anakin Skywalker would die, instead remove all damage from him, remove him from combat, tap and transform him. --- (Back): Darth Vader

card.name: Darth Vader
card.text: Menace, Lifelink Whenever Darth Vader attacks, creatures defending player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter on Darth Vader. --- (Front): Anakin Skywalker

card.name: Asajj Ventress
card.text: Double strike When a creature blocks Asajj Ventress, she gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Hate — Whenever Asajj Ventress attacks, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, up to one target creature blocks this turn if able.

card.name: Aurra Sing, Bane of Jedi
card.text: [+1]: You may have Aurra Sing deal 2 damage to target creature. If you don’t, Aurra Sing deals 1 damage to you. [-4]: Target opponent gets an emblem with “Whenever a nontoken creature you control leaves the battlefield, discard a card.” [-6]: Each player discards their hand. Exile all creatures. Each player’s life total becomes 1.
card.related: Aurra Sing, Bane of Jedi Emblem

card.name: Blind Worship
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has “Whenever this creature attacks, each other creature you control gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is this creature’s power.”

card.name: Boba Fett
card.text: Menace, deathtouch, haste When Boba Fett enters, put a bounty counter on up to one target nonland permanent an opponent controls. Whenever you complete a bounty, you may draw two cards. If you do, discard two cards.

card.name: Bull Rancor
card.text: Trample 3RGGW: Monstrosity 3. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put three +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as Bull Rancor is monstrous, creatures you control have menace.

card.name: C-3PO and R2D2
card.text: When C-3PO and R2D2 leaves the battlefield, you gain 4 life and draw a card. Repair 2 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with two time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Carbonite Chamber
card.text: Enchant creature When Carbonite Chamber enters, you may remove a bounty counter from up to one target creature. You control enchanted creature. It can’t attack or block, and its activated abilities can’t be activated.

card.name: Chewbacca
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Chewbacca attacks or blocks, another target creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Chief Chirpa
card.text: 2RGW: Monstrosity 2. Whenever a green creature you control dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on another target Ewok Rebel creature you control. When Chief Chirpa becomes monstrous, create three 1/1 green Ewok Rebel creature tokens.

card.name: Commander Cody
card.text: Nontoken Trooper creatures you control have “At the beginning of your end step, create a 1/1 white Trooper creature token.”

card.name: Cruelty of the Sith
card.text: Choose one — • Counter target noncreature spell. • Target player sacrifices a creature. • Cruelty of the Sith deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that permanents controller discards a card.

card.name: Cunning Abduction
card.text: Target opponent reveals their hand. Exile a nonland card revealed this way. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast that spell.

card.name: Dagobah Maw Slug
card.text: 3RGW: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) As long as Dagobah Maw Slug is monstrous, it has menace.

card.name: Dark Decision
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Dark Decision, pay 1 life. Search the top ten cards of your library for a nonland card, exile it, then shuffle. Until end of turn, you may cast that card.

card.name: Darth Maul
card.text: Double strike, haste Hate — Whenever Darth Maul attacks, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, up to one target creature can’t block Darth Maul this turn.

card.name: Darth Sidious, Sith Lord
card.text: [+3]: Destroy target noncreature permanent. [-2]: Gain control of target creature. [-9]: Darth Sidious deals 7 damage to target player. That player discards seven cards, then sacrifices seven permanents.

card.name: Darth Tyranus, Count Dooku
card.text: [+1]: Up to one target creature gets -6/-0 until your next turn. [-3]: You may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, search your library for an artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. [-6]: Target player’s life total becomes 5. Another target player’s life total becomes 30.

card.name: Ferocity of the Underworld
card.text: Choose one — • Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less. • Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. • Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Force Choke
card.text: Counter target spell. When a spell is countered this way, its owner may pay life equal to that spell’s mana value. If they do, they return that card from their graveyard to their hand. Scry 2.

card.name: Force Mastery
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You gain life equal to its mana value.

card.name: General Grievous
card.text: Double strike A Fine Addition — Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on General Grievous. Remove two +1/+1 counters from General Grievous: Return General Grievous to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Greater Krayt Dragon
card.text: Trample XXRGW: Monstrosity X. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put X +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Greater Krayt Dragon becomes monstrous, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter among creatures you control.

card.name: Greedo
card.text: Creatures blocking or blocked by Greedo have first strike. When Greedo dies, you may search your library for an outlaw card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. (Assassins, Mercenaries, Pirates, Rogues, and Warlocks are outlaws.)

card.name: Hot Pursuit
card.text: When Hot Pursuit enters, put a bounty counter on up to one target nonland permanent. Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 for each bounty counter on them. Whenever you complete a bounty, put a bounty counter on up to one target creature.

card.name: Hunt to Extinction
card.text: Put a bounty counter on up to two target nonland permanents. Hunt to Extinction deals X damage to each creature and an additional X damage to each creature with a bounty counter.

card.name: Images of the Past
card.text: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, then exile those creatures.

card.name: Iron Fist of the Empire
card.text: Hate — At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, you gain 2 life and create a 2/2 red Trooper creature token with first strike named Royal Guard.

card.name: Jabba the Hutt
card.text: Defender {T}: Put a bounty counter on target nonland permanent. 2R, {T}: Create a tapped 4/4 red Mercenary creature token named Bounty Hunter. It fights target creature an opponent controls with a bounty counter. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Jedi Knight
card.text: When Jedi Knight leaves the battlefield, return target nonland permanent you don’t control to its owner’s hand. Meditate 1U (1U: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Jedi Sentinel
card.text: Flash When Jedi Sentinel enters, return another target creature you control and target creature you don’t control each to their owners’ hands.

card.name: Luke Skywalker
card.text: Lifelink, vigilance Whenever another creature enters under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Luke Skywalker. Remove all +1/+1 counters from Luke Skywalker: Luke Skywalker gains hexproof until end of turn. Activate this ability only if at least one +1/+1 counter is removed this way.

card.name: Maintenance Droid
card.text: Droid spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. {1}, {T}: Remove a repair counter from a card you own in exile. Repair 4 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with four time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: March of the Droids
card.text: Remove all repair counters from cards you own in exile. Put each card that had a repair counter removed this way from exile onto the battlefield. Then create a 1/1 colorless Droid artifact creature token for each Droid you control.

card.name: Might of the Wild
card.text: Choose one — • Creatures with power 3 or less can’t block this turn. • Destroy target artifact or enchantment. • Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Nute Gunray
card.text: Whenever an artifact enters under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn. {1}, {T}, Sacrifice a nontoken artifact: Create a 1/1 colorless Droid artifact creature token.

card.name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
card.text: [+1]: Until your next turn, up to one target creature you control gains vigilance and protection from the color of your choice. [-1]: Tap up to three target creatures. [-7]: You get an emblem with “Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance, first strike, and lifelink.”

card.name: Outer Rim Slaver
card.text: When Outer Rim Slaver enters, you may put a bounty counter on target nonland permanent. If that permanent is a creature, you may have up to one target creature you control fight that creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Precipice of Mortis
card.text: If a Jedi entering or leaving the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Primal Instinct
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on that creature.

card.name: Princess Leia
card.text: When Princess Leia enters, create two 1/1 white Rebel creature tokens. Princess Leia gets +1/+1 for each other Rebel creature you control. Other Rebel creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Qui-Gon Jinn
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Qui-Gon Jinn attacks alone, he gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. When Qui-Gon Jinn leaves the battlefield, you may exile target card from a graveyard. Meditate 1W (1W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Rumor Monger
card.text: When Rumor Monger enters, put a bounty counter on up to two target creatures your opponents control. Whenever you complete a bounty, you may put its counters on another target creature an opponent controls. (You complete a bounty when a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter is put into their graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: Salvage Squad
card.text: When Salvage Squad enters, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, you gain 2 life and draw two cards.

card.name: Sarlacc Pit
card.text: Defender, hexproof {T}: Add {C}. 2RG, Sacrifice a land: Monstrosity 1. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Sarlacc Pit becomes monstrous, it loses hexproof and gains first strike and deathtouch.

card.name: Senator Bail Organa
card.text: Activated abilities of creatures you control cost {1} less to activate. This effect can’t reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana. As long as you control four or more creatures, Senator Bail Organa gets +2/+2.

card.name: Senator Lott Dod
card.text: Spells your opponents cast that target you cost {2} more to cast. Senator Lott Dod and other creatures you control have ward {1}. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {1}.)

card.name: Tarfful, Wookiee General
card.text: Whenever you put one or more counters on one or more creatures, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. Do this only once each turn. 3RG: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.)

card.name: Senator Padmé Amidala
card.text: Whenever you draw one or more cards, you gain that much life.

card.name: Hondo Ohnaka
card.text: {1}, {T}: Put a bounty counter on target nonland permanent an opponent controls. Whenever you complete a bounty, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn. (You complete a bounty when a permanent an opponent controls with a bounty counter is put into their graveyard from the battlefield.)

card.name: Sith Magic
card.text: Hate — At the beginning of each combat, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, you may return up to one target creature card from a graveyard to the battlefield under your control with a finality counter. It gains lifelink and haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. (If a creature with a finality counter would die, exile it instead.)

card.name: Sith Mindseer
card.text: Hate — When Sith Mindseer enters, if an opponent lost life from a source other than combat damage this turn, gain control of target creature for as long as Sith Mindseer remains on the battlefield.

card.name: Slave I
card.text: First strike, spaceflight Whenever a creature dealt damage by Slave I this turn dies, put two +1/+1 counters on Slave I. Crew 2

card.name: Star Destroyer
card.text: Spaceflight 3U: Tap target creature. 3B: Create a TIE Fighter, a 2/1 black Vehicle artifact token with spaceflight and crew 1. Then create a 1/1 white Trooper creature token. 3R: Star Destroyer deals 2 damage to any target without spaceflight. Crew 3

card.name: Tank Droid
card.text: Whenever Tank Droid enters, attacks, blocks, or dies, create a 1/1 colorless Droid artifact creature token. Repair 3 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Trade Federation Battleship
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Other Droid creatures you control get +1/+1 {3}, {T}: Create two 1/1 colorless Droid artifact creature tokens. Crew 3

card.name: Unity of the Droids
card.text: Choose one — • Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target artifact creature this turn. • Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. • Destroy target nonartifact creature.

card.name: Wisdom of the Jedi
card.text: Choose one — • Prevent all damage that would be dealt to players this turn. • Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. • Counter target spell with mana value 3 or less.

card.name: Wookiee Mystic
card.text: {T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}. If that mana is spent to cast a creature spell, that creature enters with an additional +1/+1 counter.

card.name: Yoda, Jedi Master
card.text: [+1]: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one on the bottom of your library. [0]: Exile another target permanent you own. Return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of your next end step. [-5]: You get an emblem with “Hexproof, you and your creatures have.”

card.name: Fulfill Contract
card.text: Destroy target creature with a bounty counter. When a creature is destroyed this way, you may put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target outlaw creature you control. (Assassins, Mercenaries, Pirates, Rogues, and Warlocks are outlaws.)

card.name: N-1 Starfighter
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Whenever N-1 Starfighter deals combat damage to an opponent or a permanent they protect, you may pay 1W/U. If you do, exile up to one target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner’s control. (Players protect permanents that can be attacked.) Crew 1

card.name: Ravenous Wampa
card.text: 2R, Sacrifice another creature: Monstrosity 2. (If this creature isn’t monstrous, put two +1/+1 counters on it and it becomes monstrous.) When Ravenous Wampa becomes monstrous, it deals 2 damage to any nonplayer target.

card.name: Strike Team Commando
card.text: When Strike Team Commando enters, you may destroy target artifact without spaceflight.

card.name: Tri-Fighter
card.text: Spaceflight (This creature can only block or be blocked by creatures with spaceflight.) Repair 3 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with three time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Wookiee Raidleader
card.text: Whenever Wookiee Raidleader attacks, another target creature gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Ancient Holocron
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {T}: Add two mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast multicolored spells.

card.name: Dark Trooper
card.text: Repair 2 (When this creature dies, you may exile it with two time counters. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove one. When the last is removed, you may cast it this turn.)

card.name: Drone Holocron
card.text: {T}: Put a charge counter on Drone Holocron. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Drone Holocron: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}. {T}, Remove two charge counters from Drone Holocron: Add WU or UB.

card.text: {T}: Put a charge counter on Jedi Holocron. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Jedi Holocron: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}. {T}, Remove two charge counters from Jedi Holocron: Add GW or WU.

card.name: Lightsaber
The Death Star
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on The Death Star. {T}, Remove three charge counters from The Death Star: Destroy target permanent. {T}, Remove ten charge counters from The Death Star: Target player loses the game.

card.text: {T}: Put a charge counter on Sith Holocron. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Sith Holocron: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}. {T}, Remove two charge counters from Sith Holocron: Add UB or BR.

card.text: {T}: Put a charge counter on Outlaw Holocron. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Outlaw Holocron: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}. {T}, Remove two charge counters from Outlaw Holocron: Add BR or RG.

card.text: {T}: Put a charge counter on Wild Holocron. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Wild Holocron: Add {R}, {G} or {W}. {T}, Remove two charge counters from Wild Holocron: Add RG or GW.

card.name: Trooper Armor
Jedi Enclave
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Jedi Enclave: Search your library for a basic Forest, Plains, or Island card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Droid Factory: Search your library for a basic Plains, Island, or Swamp card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Sith Ruins: Search your library for a basic Island, Swamp, or Mountain card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Underworld Slums: Search your library for a basic Swamp, Mountain, or Forest card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Jungle Village: Search your library for a basic Mountain, Forest, or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Jedi Temple
card.text: Jedi Temple enters tapped. When Jedi Temple enters, add {W}. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

card.name: Droid Foundry
card.text: Droid Foundry enters tapped. When Droid Foundry enters, add {U}. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

card.text: Sith Citadel enters tapped. When Sith Citadel enters, add {B}. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

card.text: Hutt Palace enters tapped. When Hutt Palace enters, add {R}. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

card.name: Ewok Village
card.text: Ewok Village enters tapped. When Ewok Village enters, add {G}. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}: Target creature can’t be blocked this turn.

card.name: Moisture Farm
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Put a charge counter on Moisture Farm. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Moisture Farm: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Kamino Cloning Facility
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a Trooper spell. {4}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Trooper creature token.

card.name: Jedi Inquirer
card.text: When Jedi Inquirer enters, exile up to one target battle or enchantment. Meditate 3W (3W: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: AT-AT
card.text: Vigilance As long as AT-AT is a creature and it’s your turn, your opponents can’t cast spells. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

card.name: The Battle of Coruscant
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When The Battle of Coruscant enters, you may discard a card or sacrifice a land. When you do, draw two cards. Vehicles you control that are attacking The Battle of Coruscant can’t be blocked. --- (Back): Do It!

card.name: Do It!
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don’t control. --- (Front): The Battle of Coruscant

card.name: The Battle of Heroes
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When The Battle of Heroes enters, up to one target creature you control fights up to one other target creature. --- (Back): Banks of Mustafar

card.name: Banks of Mustafar
card.text: Banks of Mustafar enters tapped. 1RR, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Banks of Mustafar deals 2 damage to target opponent. --- (Front): The Battle of Heroes

card.name: The Battle of Kamino
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When The Battle of Kamino enters, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an artifact or Trooper card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. --- (Back): Sink the City

card.name: Sink the City
card.text: Exile target artifact or creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 white Trooper creature token. --- (Front): The Battle of Kamino

card.name: The Battle of Christophsis
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) Flash When The Battle of Christophsis enters, return target spell or nonland permanent to its owner’s hand. --- (Back): Arc Trooper

card.name: Arc Trooper
card.text: Trooper creatures you control have flying. --- (Front): The Battle of Christophsis

card.name: The Battle of Scarif
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) When The Battle of Scarif enters, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature, land, or Vehicle card from among them, put it into your hand, then shuffle. --- (Back): Citadel Landing Zone

card.name: Citadel Landing Zone
card.text: Citadel Landing Zone enters tapped. {2}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. --- (Front): The Battle of Scarif

card.name: Duel of the Fates
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to an opponent and/or a permanent they protect, you may exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn. --- (Back): The Sith Revealed

card.name: The Sith Revealed
card.text: Search your library for a Jedi or Sith card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. --- (Front): Duel of the Fates

card.name: The Battle of Felucia
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) card.name: HAVw A6 Juggernaut
card.text: Trample Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are placed on another creature you control, put a +1/+1 counter on HAVw A6 Juggernaut. This ability triggers only once each turn. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or greater: This Siege becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.) --- (Front): The Battle of Felucia

card.name: Amidala, Queen of Naboo
card.text: Whenever Amidala, Queen of Naboo or another creature enters under your control, you gain 1 life. At the beginning of your end step, if you’ve gained 5 or more life this turn, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Bludgeoning Pain
card.text: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Tap that creature.

card.name: Obi-Wan, Jedi Padawan
card.text: When Obi-Wan, Jedi Padawan enters, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Meditate 1U (1U: Return this creature to its owner’s hand. Meditate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: The Battle of Kashyyyk
card.text: (As a Siege enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, exile it, then cast it transformed.) Whenever you defeat The Battle of Kashyyyk or another battle, draw a card. Then you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. --- (Back): Orders Received

card.name: Orders Received
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land. Search your library for a land card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. --- (Front): The Battle of Kashyyyk

card.name: The Battle of Utapau
card.text: When The Battle of Utapau enters, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. --- (Back): TSMEU-6 Wheel Bike

card.text: Menace Whenever TSMEU-6 Wheel Bike attacks, defending player loses 1 life for each creature that crewed TSMEU-6 Wheel Bike this turn. card.name: General Grievous SPG
card.text: Double strike A Fine Addition — Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may put a +1/+1 counter on General Grievous. Remove two +1/+1 counters from General Grievous: Return General Grievous to its owner’s hand.

card.name: Amidala, Queen of Naboo SPG
card.text: Whenever Amidala, Queen of Naboo or another creature enters under your control, you gain 1 life. At the beginning of your end step, if you’ve gained 5 or more life this turn, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Boba Fett SPG
card.text: Menace, deathtouch, haste When Boba Fett enters, put a bounty counter on up to one target nonland permanent an opponent controls. Whenever you complete a bounty, you may draw two cards. If you do, discard two cards.

card.name: Conscription
card.text: Gain control of target creature with power 2 or less. It becomes a Trooper in addition to its other types.
